text: Please don t do it Hey guys and girls amp x B Police officer from the land down under here amp x B New account for obvious reasons amp x B A bit of back story to this post amp x B I ve been a Police officer for the past five years and I ve pretty much seen it all  From petty theft to suicide  Today I attended  a suicide job that has hit particularly hard amp x B See the problem was  we didn t know what we were walking into  We came across a car that was parked just far enough out of the way to peak our interest  As we approached the car a familiar smell filled the air  it s a smell you don t ever forget amp x B As we investigated the scene we found more and more of this persons final few moments  The pile of cigarettes in the centre console  the crushed cans of beer in foot well   amp x B This person had laid out photos of his kids on the passenger seat of the car  They then wrote the words  Please forgive me  on the back of their hand amp x B The mess was unforgettable and has played over and over in my head since I left work amp x B The reason I m sharing this is to plead with you  please  for what ever reason your thinking of taking your own life  please don t amp x B You won t have to be there when we come to comfort  your wife  husband  son s and daughters amp x B You won t be there to tell your children that mummy or daddy won t be home for Christmas amp x B You ll have no idea of the hole you ve left when your gone amp x B Please  please don t do it
